bio: A bird who uses a lasso to steal whatever he wants. He even lassoed his ex on her wedding day!

soultimate.name: Ropin' Robbin'
soultimate.description: Deal massive damage to foes nearby.

skill.effect: 15% Atk boost for 20 sec when you get items or Oni Orbs.
skill.name: Peck-Me-Up

name: Robbinyu
